name: cumulocity-hellowidget-plugin
description: A demo app for showcasing creation of a custom Cumulocity UI widget plugin
author: Glenn Dwiyatcita <glenn.dwiyatcita@cumulocity.com> (https://tiny.cc/dwiyatci)

scripts.preinstall:clean: (npm up -g rimraf && rimraf -h || npm i -g rimraf) && (npm up -g yarn && yarn -h || npm i -g yarn)
scripts.install:clean: rimraf node_modules && yarn install && c8y install
scripts.deploy:easy: npm run clean:tmp && c8y deploy:target target.json
